scripts.db: docker run --name gh1db -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=gh1 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=gh1 -d postgres:9.5
scripts.db:test: docker run --name gh1dbtest -p 5434:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=gh1_test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=gh1_test -d postgres:9.5
scripts.psql: docker run -it -e PGPASSWORD=gh1 --link gh1db:postgres --rm postgres:9.5 sh -c 'exec psql -h $POSTGRES_PORT_5432_TCP_ADDR -p $POSTGRES_PORT_5432_TCP_PORT -U gh1'
scripts.psql:test: docker run -it -e PGPASSWORD=gh1_test --link gh1dbtest:postgres --rm postgres:9.5 sh -c 'exec psql -h $POSTGRES_PORT_5432_TCP_ADDR -p $POSTGRES_PORT_5432_TCP_PORT -U gh1_test'
